first.text1: Aeternum Eleven – an environmentally conscious brand, representing an affordable luxury fashion.
first.text2: An alternate universe where human creativity and way of life coexist organically with nature.

second.text1: Aeternum – infinite (lat.), reflects the philosophy of infinite life cycle, creativity, energy, an up-cycle production process.
second.text2: Eleven – sacral number 11 reflects the concept of spiritual and creative duality.

create_account.text1: Our members receive tailor-made assistance and content according to their preferences. You will enjoy access to special events, updates on our new collections, notifications when your favourite products arrive in boutique, and more exclusive offers.
create_account.text2: You can at any time withdraw your consent to receive the above-mentioned communications by clicking on the appropriate option in each email received, as well as by writing to the address privacy@maisonmargiela.com, or otherwise contacting Margiela S.a.s.u. at the addresses indicated at paragraph 1 of the information notice. You can at any time withdraw your consent to be subject to profiling by writing to the address privacy@maisonmargiela.com, privacy@otb.net or otherwise contacting the Joint Controllers at the addresses indicated at paragraph 1 of the information notice.
create_account.check1: Having read the Information notice, I authorize Margiela S.a.s.u. to the processing of my Personal Data for Marketing purposes as described in paragraph 3.1.b) of the information notice
create_account.check2: Having read the information notice, I authorize the Joint Controllers OTB S.p.A. and Margiela S.a.s.u. to process my Personal Data for the purpose of Customer analysis to provide experiences in line with your preferences as described in paragraph 3.2.a) of the information notice
